official_title: To amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to clarify the law with respect to the applicability of such Act to subsidiaries of bank subsidiaries of bank holding companies.

summary.text: Bank Holding Company Amendments of 1989 - Amends the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to exclude from its coverage any company whose activities are authorized by State law and whose voting shares are owned by a bank controlled by a bank holding company.

titles.title: To amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to clarify the law with respect to the applicability of such Act to subsidiaries of bank subsidiaries of bank holding companies.
